articles.title: American musical satirist Tom Lehrer dies at 97, US media report - BBC
articles.description: Lehrer, a Harvard-trained mathematician, wrote darkly humorous songs, often with political connotations.
articles.content:
American musician and satirist Tom Lehrer has died at the age of 97, according to US media reports.
Lehrer, a Harvard-trained mathematician, wrote darkly humorous songs, often with political connota… [+942 chars]
